articles.title: Inflation Tops 100% in Argentina As the Price of Beef Spikes
articles.description: Argentina logged a three-digit inflation rate for the first time in over 30 years in February, according to government data published Tuesday.
articles.content:
Inflation topped 100% in Argentina last month, according to official data published Tuesday.
The country logged a three-digit inflation rate for the first time in over 30 years in February.

articles.description: “The World Cup finals are not played every day, (the gloves) are special. But it helps a child much more than me having them hanging in a frame in my house,” said Martinez.
articles.content:

articles.title: College Experience in Argentina Vs. Colleges in the US
articles.description: Leigh Shulman was surprised by how few resources students had at Argentine universities, but it helped her daughter grow up faster as a student.
articles.content:
My daughter and I live in Argentina, and she decided to go to college here instead of in the US.
Her college experience was very different from the one I had in the US.
